body.name: Crestlive Products Vertical Dresser Storage Tower - Sturdy Steel Frame, Wood Top, Easy Pull Fabric Bins, Wood Handles - Organizer Unit for Bedroom, Hallway, Entryway, Closets - 5 Drawers (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 27 mins
features: ✔ 【5 DRAWERS CHEST】 Features 5 removable drawers; Use in or out of the closet and keep clutter under control by storing all of your clothing and accessories in one convenient place; Store and organize workout gear, leggings, yoga pants, sweaters, linens and more; The vertical design fits easily in many locations throughout the home; Use as a nightstand to put your alarm clock, journal, glasses; Mix & match with other Crestlive storage organizers for endless organizational possibilities.

✔ 【STYLISH SMART STORAGE】 This furniture stand boasts a slim, light weight design to easily fit into smaller spaces while still providing plenty of storage space; Wood top provides a hard surface to place lamps, books, decor, and more; The generously sized removable drawers have wood handles to make opening and closing simple; Plastic feet will not scratch flooring, and they are adjustable for uneven surfaces. If you want, you can fix it to wall with enclosed screws to make it more stable.

✔ 【FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE】 Create coordinated organization in any room of the house; Great for children, teens and adults; Use anywhere you want to add a little style to your organizational needs; This easy-to-use chest of drawers can be used in multiple rooms throughout the home; Great for closets, bedrooms, nurseries, playrooms, entryways and more; Ideal for small spaces such as apartments, condos, and dorm rooms.

✔ 【QUALITY CONSTRUCTION】 Made of breathable high-quality fabric; Strong steel frame and durable MDF wood top; Wood Handles; Plastic feet protect floors; Hardware is included for hassle-free installation; Easy Care - wipe clean with a damp cloth and allow to air dry.
✔ 【THOUGHTFULLY SIZED】 This storage tower measures 17.7" L x 11.8" W x 46.1" H. Each drawers measures 15.7’’ L x 11’’ W x 8.7’’ H; Wood top measures 17.7" L x 11.8" W x 0.6’’ Thick.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SMART 5-DRAWER STORAGE Use in or out of the closet and keep clutter under control; The easy-to-move dresser features 5 same size drawers; Wood top provides a hard surface to place lamps, books, decor; This furniture stand boasts a slim, lightweight design to easily fit into smaller spaces.

Will this dresser store clothing and comforters? Maybe OK and it's based on its size and weight-bearing. The load capacity of each drawer is 11 lbs. Does the dresser have a smell? Usually no odor. Maybe a little manufacturing odor from the materials used and the smell will fade in a short time. And you could place baking soda in it to absorb the scent or a fragrant sachet. How much weight can the top hold? 33 lbs for wood top. Could put lamps, books, decor not a heavy TV. Does the dresser come with wheels? No, it is very light weight. You can easily move it around.

Folding Fabric Drawer Keep clutter under control by storing all of your clothing and accessories in generously sized drawers. End-Stop Design End-stop design prevents the drawer from sliding off the back end. Adjustable Knob Plastic feet will not scratch the floor, and they are adjustable for uneven surfaces. Extra Stability You could assemble the anti-tipping kit that prevents the storage dresser from falling or sliding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked the quality of this product so much that I ordered a second one a few days later after assembling it. It’s easy to assemble and suggest 2 people but I was able to do it alone it just took a little longer.Fits perfect in by tiny home size room. Holds all my essentials and is very attractive.Good price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small dresser to fit my extra small items in our rental space. Nothing too bulky but enough to keep my clothes organized. I cannot tell you how perfect this little system worked. Its sturdy, has handles easy to put together. And its super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doubt I'll buy it again
reviews.reviewText: The value for money is not great. It's not sturdy, draws easily fall out and the overall quality is not great.However, it is easy to assembly, and the storage capacity is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great organizer
reviews.reviewText: We use this to store clothing for our little ones, and the whole unit is pretty to look at, easy to assemble, and has the ability to be fashioned to the wall to prevent it from being pulled down. The drawers are cloth with a sturdy bottom, the whole unit is relatively sturdy given the materials they are made from. It’s perfect for the use we have, to organize our closet. It’s pretty enough to be used anywhere in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage tower, very roomy and great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: The tower was easy to put together by myself (less than an hour), plenty of extra parts included (except the foot piece, which I'll get to in a moment). The finished product looks great and I can store a lot of stuff in them! The fabric cubes feel very durable and the handles don't feel like they'll break off or rip through with any force.When I received the parts I got one extra of most parts except one of the foot pieces, which I ended up needing as one had a bad thread. I contacted customer service and they talked me through the issue, sending me a new pack of foot pieces quickly. Very friendly too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and look!!
reviews.reviewText: Love this slim portable dresser drawer set. Very easy to assemble. Looks more expensive than it costs. Drawers are nice and deep. Love the added touch of wooden handles. Definitely worth it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice extra storage space.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two units for use in a closet and appreciate the extra space I now have. The unit is light and sturdy when attached to the wall. This is great for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crestlive Five drawer fabric dresser
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive, roomy and sturdy. Perfect for my tight corner. I am quite satisfied.
Unfortunately I thought it's a wood drawing. I am disappointed.
